```{r}
#| label: packages
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(ncaahoopR)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)

```

```{r}
acc_teams1 <- c(
  "Duke", "North Carolina", "Virginia", "Pittsburgh", "Clemson",
  "Syracuse", "Virginia Tech", "Florida State", "NC State",
  "Wake Forest", "Boston College", "Georgia Tech",
  "Notre Dame", "Miami", "SMU", "Cal", "Stanford", "Louisville"
)

acc_teams2 <- c(
  "Duke", "UNC", "UVA", "Pitt", "Clemson",
  "Syracuse", "Virginia Tech", "Florida State", "NC State",
  "Wake Forest", "Boston College", "Georgia Tech",
  "Notre Dame", "Miami", "SMU", "Cal", "Stanford", "Louisville"
)


years <- 2020:2025
```




```{r}
get_acc_games <- function(team, year) {
  get_schedule(team, year) |>
    filter(opponent %in% acc_teams1) |>
    mutate(
      season = year,
      opponent = opponent, 
      team = team
    ) |>
    select(
      season,
      date,
      team,
      opponent,
      location,
      team_score,
      opp_score,
    )
}

```

```{r}
acc_games <- data.frame()

for(team in acc_teams2){
  for(year in years){
    sched <- get_schedule(team, year)
    acc_games <- bind_rows(acc_games, sched)
  }
}
```

acc_games
